sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Checks the mac listed on the table AND the associated network adapters, and from them, select the best MAC to use. (Prioritize adapters with 10.x.x.x addresses and/or adapters labeled "Local Area Connection".)
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: LINK_PickBestMacAddress
